tool_description:
Access to the official United Kingdom Government company register via this API. Ideal for KYB purposes

When prompted for authentication, use RAPIDAPI as username, and RAPIDAPI as password
title: UK Company Data

api_list.name: Search by name
api_list.description: Search the UK Company register by name

api_list.name: GetCompany
api_list.description: Get a UK company by it's company number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uk-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/default/GB/company/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uk-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetCompanyDirectors
api_list.description: Get  UK Company Directors by the company number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uk-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/default/GB/company/{id}/officers"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uk-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
